description: Structured work queue for build sessions. Items consumed top-down. R sessions populate via directive intake and direct promotion. Status lifecycle: pending → in-progress → done | blocked | retired. Blocked items may have a blocker_check (shell command) — heartbeat.sh runs it before B sessions and auto-promotes to pending on exit 0. Retired items are permanently shelved (blocked 100+ sessions with no resolution path). Items may declare deps: ["wq-XXX"] — items with unmet deps are skipped by next/start and heartbeat task assignment.

queue.title: Add /status/costs endpoint for session cost trends

queue.title: Add tests for audit-report.json handling
queue.description: audit-report.json touched 5+ times in last 20 sessions. Add unit tests for: report reading, critical issue extraction, delta tracking, cost aggregation. Prevents regressions like the [object Object] bug fixed in R#102.

queue.title: Fix intel consumption tracking — set consumed_session when archiving
queue.description: session-context.mjs archives intel with `archived_session` but never sets `consumed_session`. Broke around s600. 173 entries collected but never marked consumed. Fix: add `consumed_session: COUNTER` alongside `archived_session` in the archive mapping.
